website_summaries.verdict: Thick cotton canvas construction allows it to be tough and withstand some damage, while maintaining breathability.
pros: The company took extra time to ensure the zippers are high-quality and can easily open and close the bags
Handles allow you to move the bags around easily even when filled with items
Extra-strength seams for those who like to overload their storage bags
cons: Some users complain that the bags are smaller than they expected

customer_reviews.title: PLEASE BRING BACK THE SQUARE LIFEWIT COTTON CANVAS STORAGE BAGS WITH THE METAL FRAME!!!
customer_reviews.text: I first bought the Lifewit Cotton Canvas storage bags with the metal frame. I love it. Everyone else that bought the bags with metal frames must have loved them too. Because when I went buy more they were out of stock. They have been out of stock for about a year now. So I bought these. I do not love them. They are a duffel bag with a zipper. They do not have the metal frame. It makes moving them from one place to another miserable if you want your items inside to stay neatly folded. PLEASE BRING BACK THE SQUARE LIFEWIT COTTON CANVAS STORAGE BAGS WITH THE METAL FRAME!!! I will buy them and throw these away!
customer_reviews.author: ReesInNJ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, absolutely perfect! Breathable canvas and fits a Calif king stuffed/winter comforter!
customer_reviews.text: Totally impressed, just what I was looking for to store a winter weight and overstuffed California king sized comforter until needed again, even has some room to spare. Allows air circulation to help prohibit mold/mildew, very important for expensive fabrics like flax linen or hemp linen fabrics while protecting the contents from dust and bugs. Like most bags with zippers be careful how you carry them, especially if they have something heavy like a comforter or you could pull the zipper apart, the 3 sided zipper on this bag appears to be well sewn and durable. Just handle this bag with care and it should last a lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: GDF

customer_reviews.title: Great canvas bags overall
customer_reviews.text: Great canvas bags with no smell out of the box. They feel durable and fit well under my bed while holding QUITE a lot of bedding and blankets. I'm removing one star because while the zippers aren't flimsy, they don't feel super durable either. If you watch it and make sure to line up the zipper before using it, I'm sure they'll last a long time but if you don't... Also the description sort of hides that one of the bags is a big one but the other is a smaller bag. Still works great for me and good value, but they could be more up front about that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very large!
customer_reviews.text: I needed something for underved storage since I have a lot of camping supplies and a very small apartment. I knew before purchasing them that they were just cloth bags and would not have the stability necessary to stand up on their own, however I thought once I filled them they would take shape and be easy to transport which isn't really the case. I only ended up using one they were so large so that's a plus, but this is definitely better for storing blankets or off-season clothing.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Color is different, but great storage bags
customer_reviews.text: These bags are true to the size listed in the description, so very large! The color in the photo makes them appear like tan canvas with a black zipper, but mine came as more of a yellow colored canvas with a navy zipper. The material is thick and feels durable. It does not have any internal support structure so it will not keep the shape shown in the photos unless it was completely full of blankets. I'm very happy overall with the product. I was able to fit 3 pillows, a well padded mattress cover and a duvet in the bag and the zipper is having no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Allysa

customer_reviews.title: Well made.
customer_reviews.text: Thick canvas and heavy duty zipper. I use one to store wool blankets and the other for cotton quilts. Natural fabrics fair better when the fabric can breathe during storage. Ample room for more than one in each container. I expect years of service from these storage boxes.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: High quality materials and construction for flexible storage
customer_reviews.text: We ordered 3 two-packs of these bags for breathable storage of duvets, extra pillows, and seasonal wardrobes. The bags are heavy cotton canvas with sturdy zippers. The description on the site includes a "foldable frame" but the bags arrived with no frames at all. After a prompt response to our complaint and some discussion, the seller offered us a partial refund that we accepted. We plan to use the refund to purchase plexiglass cut to fit inside each bag as a supportive base. I am happy with both the quality of the bags and the seller's responsive solution to our problem.
customer_reviews.author: Flicka

customer_reviews.title: They work as I hoped
customer_reviews.text: Hard to get these to look "square" like the picture...more like a duffle bag...bit they are quite effective for me to store a lot of clothes under the bed and can conform to odd spaces. I like that they can breath and not collect condensation like plastic. They can be washed. Just remember they have no ridged structure. Glad I bought these.
customer_reviews.author: Brewman

customer_reviews.title: Great for feather and down products
customer_reviews.text: These are a sturdy cotton canvas. I have all my feather pillows and blankets in them. Plenty of room. One pillow and a light weight blanket is in one, with a little room to spare. The other one has just feather pillows. Zippers work well. Wish they had a see through window. I would highly recommend if you are storing feather and down products.
customer_reviews.author: Netti51

customer_reviews.title: These are the best storage bags I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: These are the best storage bags I've ever used ! I was able to fit 3 full size comforters in one bag and the zipper closed without any issues. There is a very slight odor when you first take it out of the plastic bag but I left it open overnight in the guest room and in the morning there was no smell.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Lee

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed for storing my quilts.
customer_reviews.text: Nice product, seems well made and sturdy. It is quite large and more than comfortably holds one of my king sized quilts (approx. 120" by 120"). I really like the protection afforded for the quilts with this product. And it's washable.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Love these storage containers
customer_reviews.text: They are definitively on the larger size (after all they are 100 L each) but for me that was perfect! I was able to store comforters, pillows and a set of sheets and now everything is organized! Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Plath27

customer_reviews.title: Large capacity bags.
customer_reviews.text: Great underbed storage. They are just canvas bags so they need to be full to retain their shape but they hold a lot. Only needed one of the two for off-season clothing.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Camera Camper

customer_reviews.title: good so far
customer_reviews.text: the bags hold two old quilts and appear to be well made. I have had no issues but did not comment on the durability because of only having them for a year or so.
customer_reviews.author: Thrifty Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Keep Lookinf
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting something much more sturdy and structure. This was the flimsiest item I’ve ever purchased. Doesn’t even fit under the bed.
customer_reviews.author: Ecbell

customer_reviews.title: Look good
customer_reviews.text: just smaller than it show on the picture, measure before you buy it
customer_reviews.author: John C

customer_reviews.title: Safe storage
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our down queen comforter over 30 years old and who knows where it’s original storage bag went! Thanks for this great product
customer_reviews.author: Red Hat Queen Katella

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, good deal
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect for under-bed storage. They don’t have any suppirts so the sides fall down but they held so much, it didn’t matter. The canvas is very strong, I would recommend this product to anyone in need of storage, and the price for 2 was great!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah B.

customer_reviews.title: Stuff controled
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and granddaughter had wedding and special occasion dresses they left with me "for a little while". I needed the closet space, so folded the dresses in tissue and placed them on a shelf. At some point the containers will make it much simpler to return to owner!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: conflicted
customer_reviews.text: so im conflicted about this review, mainly because it is great, stores A LOT, and I haven't even been able to use the second one because so much fit in the first one. my issue is that I bought it thinking that there would be like enforced sides in terms of it staying up and box like, but instead it was just canvas. other than that I love it!
customer_reviews.author: @ExquisiteYardie

customer_reviews.title: Strong
customer_reviews.text: This looks like it is going to keep the stink bugs outta my extra blankets in the attic!
customer_reviews.author: Dallas Alice

customer_reviews.title: Great job.
customer_reviews.text: What can I say? It works! Its durable! It holds a lot and meets my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: V. Robeiri

customer_reviews.title: Good canvas, loose
customer_reviews.text: Material seems sturdy enough, not sure how long the zipper will last
customer_reviews.author: Happy Camper

customer_reviews.title: Kinda like it
customer_reviews.text: For some reason I assumed they would be boxed like the way they're shown in the photo but it doesn’t do that. It’s more like a floppy bag. It’s a good size though. It can hold a lot of my blankets.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn12

customer_reviews.title: Nice storage option
customer_reviews.text: I love that these are soft because you can put things in them and they will fit to the shape of the item!
customer_reviews.author: Abby’s Here

customer_reviews.title: Helps
customer_reviews.text: It is a great way to take advantage of the under bed space
customer_reviews.author: Sue Burdette

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Got rid of a lot of closet clutter, felt durable putting away. FYI it is on the taller side when completely filled, you might need to fight it under the average bed.
customer_reviews.author: Dan O'Connor

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: They were as described and fitted the space perfectly. Fabric is nice and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: SuntreeJL

customer_reviews.title: Good for storing clothes under the bed!!
customer_reviews.text: I use it for storing clothes as my baby grows out of it. Prefect for storing under the bed.
customer_reviews.author: Lucia Salazar

customer_reviews.title: Well made and durrable.
customer_reviews.text: They are nice storage containers. The canvas is of good quality, and the zippers are too.
customer_reviews.author: Inkieblur

customer_reviews.title: Very high quality
customer_reviews.text: Heavy canvas will do a good job of protecting my linens and quilts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonkaris

customer_reviews.title: Good for storage
customer_reviews.text: Not what I was hoping it would be, but works just as fine.
customer_reviews.author: Marcelina Martinez

customer_reviews.title: thick canvas
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised when I received it. It was such a thick canvas material. It has a certain weight and it is very good. I like this storage bag very much.
customer_reviews.author: Lourdes Fedora

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great product Big Durable Able to store winter clothing and extra blankets
customer_reviews.author: Dorothea Dempsey

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Used for stuffed animals and fits under bed. Good depth. Tough material.
customer_reviews.author: hyli girolamo

customer_reviews.title: Size great for queen sized comforters
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for storing a thick queen sized comforter.
customer_reviews.author: Margo

customer_reviews.title: Well made. Flexible. No weird smell.
customer_reviews.text: I am moving and was looking for a flexible storage bags without them being just a laudry bags. And these fit the bill perfectly. The cotton canvas is super thick. It's well sewn. Zippers work fine. They are big enough to fit many things but not too big so that it's hard to carry. A few reviewers complain about the lack of frame. But I actually don't need frames because I want flexible storages that can be bigger or smaller depending on the content. And I want them to fit wherever I store them. One important thing to point out: there's no odor, no weird chemical smell. I am so happy about this!!
customer_reviews.author: Sainte Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Zippers break
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 different sizes and brands of this type of bag. The other brand's zippers were worse. This is good breathable material but one zipper broke almost immediately. Waiting to see how long the other lasts when I pull it out of storage. Also, this type of bag is very floppy so it's not a good option to fit on any normal size shelf--best for underbed or longer term storage. The floppy-ness may contribute to the stress on the zipper but having tried 2 brands, am puzzled as to why manufacturers can't figure out a way to reinforce zippers so that their products are reasonably durable and functional for intended purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Voracious Reader

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: The color is a neutral cream with a navy zipper. One storage bag is great for two twin comforters. I also used one bag for my giant tulle (fluffy as heck) dress. The dress was tougher than the comforters to get in. I’m using these bags for short term storage and dust reduction. The zipper isn’t great. You need two hands, one to hold the sides closed and another to use the zipper. Even that doesn’t work great! Hopefully they last through a few uses.
customer_reviews.author: Allicia

customer_reviews.title: Hold just about everything!
customer_reviews.text: These xl bags are huge! I wanted to put my winter clothes, extra bedding, fabric from sewing room and more in uniform, stackable bags/boxes. These are canvas, so they don’t have a rigid structure and even full they will have some sag to them. I just took the amazon box, cut it open and laid it in the bottom. I do wish there was an option to buy a solid bottom. Otherwise, these bags hold a ton of stuff!!
customer_reviews.author: gswa

customer_reviews.title: No structure
customer_reviews.text: This bag is large, and it is made of decent fabric, but there is absolutely no structure to it. If you are storing anything other than blankets, it will probably look like a deflated yard decoration. I got these to store collector's dolls, and they work, but they look kind of sloppy without any structure. I was happy that there was no smell to them.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Great for storage
customer_reviews.text: I store my clothing in these - summer clothes in winter and vice versa. I feel they are better for the clothing as a nice material. They are sturdy, room and strong zippers. I can store them under bed or in closets. Won't go back to plastic again.
customer_reviews.author: BaHall

customer_reviews.title: Canvas storage bags
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Great large size. Well made and zipper works perfectly. I never liked plastic storage for clothes and linens as they can't breath in such containers and end up smelling like plastic. This solves the problem.
customer_reviews.author: pb4953

customer_reviews.title: Good storage bad color
customer_reviews.text: I kinda wish it was I different color but there good if you put them up somewhere they w ok not get dusty or dirty
customer_reviews.author: Marcus

customer_reviews.title: Work great
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for! They hold all my blankets and I used another one for my large tent and tarp. Sturdy and roomy
customer_reviews.author: TO

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy storage bags
customer_reviews.text: These storage bags are very sturdy with good zippers. Works great for storing blankets.
customer_reviews.author: E S K

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: These seem to be very high quality construction. They have washed well.
customer_reviews.author: Renewed

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for clothes storage
customer_reviews.text: I use these to store my sweaters and coats under my bed.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Rabadi

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good product for the money. Perfect to store blankets etc in.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCrazyMama

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Well made, rugged cloth and sturdy zipper. Exactly the size I needed.
customer_reviews.author: L. Wellington

product_meta.title: Lifewit 100L Storage Bags Large Capacity Foldable Thick Canvas Underbed Storage for Comforters, Clothes, Blankets, Bedding, 2 Pack
